bibl.title: The Banquet of the Gods and the Picnic of the Girls: Observations on Sappho fr. 2 V. (with an Appendix on Ibycus PMGF 286). Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Critical notes on the Florence ostrakon containing Sappho's fr. 2 V., P.S.I. XIII, 1300 (= M.-P.3 1439; LDAB 3904). - Pp. 66-68: Appendix. Ibycus PMGF 286 [a reminiscence of Sappho fr. 2 V.?].
bibl.seg: TSANTSANOGLOU Kyriakos, The Banquet of the Gods and the Picnic of the Girls: Observations on Sappho fr. 2 V. (with an Appendix on Ibycus PMGF 286). Avec résumé en anglais.
Critical notes on the Florence ostrakon containing Sappho's fr. 2 V., P.S.I. XIII, 1300 (= M.-P.3 1439; LDAB 3904). - Pp. 66-68: Appendix. Ibycus PMGF 286 [a reminiscence of Sappho fr. 2 V.?].
